Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Aphid BCR1 (bacteriocyte-specific cyeteine-rich peptide 1; natural AMPs; insects, arthropods, invertebrates, animals; 3S=S, UCSS1a; BBMm)

Literature.Author: Uchi N, Fukudome M, Nozaki N, Suzuki M, Osuki KI, Shigenobu S, Uchiumi T.2019
Literature.Title: Antimicrobial Activities of Cysteine-rich Peptides Specific to Bacteriocytes of the Pea Aphid Acyrthosiphon pisum.

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (32.2%) toMyticin AL=13%, C=11%, K=9%. GRAVY: 0.145; mol wt: 6189.342; Mol formula: C282H432N71O73S6; Mol ex Coeff: 8905 (Cys paired).Activity: Active against E. coli MG1655 (MIC 5 uM). DNA sequence provided by Toshiki UCHIUMI.
